spookipy

Introduction¶

What is it?¶

spookipy is a collection of python weather algorithms to work with dataframes obtained with fstpy or numpy arrays.

spookipy philosophy¶

These algorithms are generic in nature and all share a uniform model in implementation. The idea is to use the interface to create new algorithms.
